text: The 2017 Pan American Road Cycling Championships took place at Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic, May 4–7, 2017. This was the 32nd edition of the continental championship. The event gave berths for the 2018 Central American and Caribbean Games. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |} ===Women=== {| |- |Individual
